snippet: Attorney General Loretta Lynch is taking herself out of consideration for the Supreme Court seat because of the demands of her current job, she said.
abstract: United States Atty Gen Loretta Lynch says she is not interested in being considering for Supreme Court seat vacated by death of Justice Antonin Scalia.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Loretta Lynch is taking herself out of consideration for the Supreme Court seat because of the demands of her current job, she said.

headline.main: Lynch Says She’s Unable to Consider Scalia’s Seat
headline.print_headline: Lynch Says She Isn’t Interested in Scalia’s Seat
